com.victormunoz.material

Class FabProgress

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.victormunoz.material.FabProgress

  • public class FabProgress
extends java.lang.Object
    FabProgress extends FloatingActionButton adding a circular progress around it and animations for the success and failure states.

    The Animation of the progress is set to determinate by default but can be change it via setIndeterminate(boolean).

    • Method Detail

      • setIndeterminate

        public void setIndeterminate(boolean isIndeterminate)
        Change the indeterminate mode for this progress bar. In indeterminate mode, the progress is ignored and the progress bar shows an infinite animation instead.
        Parameters:
        isIndeterminate - true to enable the indeterminate mode.
